product_name: Urban Rock: Stoney Point Bouldering and Top Roping - 3rd Edition
long_description: This updated edition of Urban Rock has been rewritten with lots of new boulder problems and area maps. Author: Chris Owen. Softcover; 138 pages; black-and-white photographs; route maps. Chris Owen, publisher; copyright 2004. In addition to route information, this book introduces climbers to the ethics of top roping and bouldering at Stoney Point.
short_description: This updated edition of Urban Rock has been rewritten with lots of new boulder problems and area maps.
